title: Darth Tyranus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, you may order a droid battalion to protect another player, granting them a higher level of defense for the night (+1 for non-sith, +2 for sith.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You may only target other Sith once per Sith player, including yourself.

desc:
Post 1296
*"Double the pride, Double the fall."*
